segments.text: The woman is drying that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s just ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and I can’t help but laugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall off that stool any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, and it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of everything happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids get their cookies before the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR
